description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for User entities, providing methods for retrieving users by username and checking if a username exists.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: Repository interface extending JpaRepository for User entity management, including custom query methods.

methods.name: findByUsername
methods.description: Finds a User entity by username, returning an Optional<User>.

methods.name: existsByUsername
methods.description: Checks if a User with the specified username exists.
